mapper.insert: insert into answers(post_id, author_id, anonymous, content, created_at) values (#{postId}, #{authorId}, #{anonymous}, #{content}, #{createdAt});
mapper.select: select a.id, u.id author_id, u.profile_image author_profile_image, u.nickname author_nickname, a.anonymous, a.content, a.created_at from answers a left join users u on u.id = a.author_id where post_id = #{postId};
select a.*, u.id author_id, u.nickname author_nickname from answers a left join users u on u.id = a.author_id where a.id = #{answerId};
select exists(select 1 from comments where answer_id = #{answerId})
mapper.update: update answers set content = '[삭제된 답변입니다.]', deleted_at = current_timestamp where id = #{answerId}
